template.subject: FOIA Request - [SPECIFIC DESCRIPTION]
template.body:
To the FOIA Officer:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act, 5 ILCS 140/1 et seq., I respectfully request access to the following public records:

[DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF RECORDS REQUESTED]

This request is made under the Illinois FOIA, which provides that "all persons are entitled to full and complete information regarding the affairs of government."

Please provide the records in the following format: [SPECIFY: copies, electronic format, inspection, etc.]

Required Contact Information:
Name: [YOUR FULL NAME]
Organization: [IF APPLICABLE]
Address: [YOUR COMPLETE MAILING ADDRESS]
Email: [YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS]
Phone: [YOUR PHONE NUMBER]
Fax: [IF APPLICABLE]

I understand that under 5 ILCS 140/6, the first 50 pages of black and white copies are provided free of charge, with additional pages at $0.15 each.

Please respond within five (5) business days as required by 5 ILCS 140/3. If any portion of this request is exempt from disclosure, please identify the specific statutory exemption and provide any segregable portions that can be released.

If this request is denied in whole or in part, please provide a written explanation of the denial and information about my right to seek review by the Public Access Counselor at (217) 558-0486 or public.access@ilag.gov.

I look forward to your prompt response within the statutory timeframe.

Sincerely,
[YOUR NAME]
[DATE]

Note: This request is made under the Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140).
